BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.advisor.executor.type.ConstructorAdviceExecutor holds a map-type field org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.advisor.executor.type.ConstructorAdviceExecutor.advices, but uses it as only a List

Class org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.advisor.executor.type.InstanceMethodAdviceExecutor holds a map-type field org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.advisor.executor.type.InstanceMethodAdviceExecutor.advices, but uses it as only a List

Class org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.advisor.executor.type.StaticMethodAdviceExecutor holds a map-type field org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.advisor.executor.type.StaticMethodAdviceExecutor.advices, but uses it as only a List
org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.log.config.LogbackConfiguration.createPatternLayout(LoggerContext): 1st parameter 'loggerContext' could be declared as ch.qos.logback.core.Context instead
Constructor new org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.log.slf4j.SLF4JAgentLogger(Logger) declares a Logger parameter
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.path.AgentPath.getJarFile(String) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.path.AgentPath.getJarFile(String) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
This API (java/io/File.<init>(Ljava/net/URI;)V) reads a file whose location might be specified by user input
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.plugin.classloader.AgentPluginClassLoader.convertClassNameToPath(String) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.plugin.config.yaml.loader.YamlPluginConfigurationLoader.load(File) uses a FileInputStream or FileOutputStream constructor
This API (java/io/File.<init>(Ljava/lang/String;)V) reads a file whose location might be specified by user input
